org.oddjob.arooa

Interface ArooaValue

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ValueFactory<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppendType, ArooaObject, AttachmentPart, BeanViewBean, BufferType, ClassType, ConnectionType, ConvertType, DateType, ExecutorThrottleType, FilesType, FileType, FormatType, HsqlConnectionType, IdentifiableValueType, ImportType, InvokeType, ListType, LogoutType, MagicBeanType, MagicClassType, MapType, PropertiesType, ResourceType, ScheduleType, SequenceType, SimpleServerSecurity, StderrType, StdinType, StdoutType, TeeType, TextPart, TokenizerType, URLClassLoaderType, UsernamePassword, ValueType, VanillaInterfaceHandler, XMLConfigurationType, XMLType

    public interface ArooaValue
    A PropertyProxy wraps an underlying type so that:
    1. The wrapped type can be configured from xml parse events.
    2. The type can manifest itself in deifferent ways. For innstance text could be either a java.lang.String or a java.io.InputStream.

    TODO: Should this interface also provide a list of supported types?

    Author:
    Rob Gordon.
